mapper.select: SELECT A.S_ID, A.DEPT_ID, A.MEMBER_ID, A.PLAN_DATE, A.START_TIME_DIV, A.START_MIN_DIV, A.END_TIME_DIV, A.END_MIN_DIV, A.SERVICE_MIN, A.PRODUCT_ID, A.SERVICE_AMT, A.PAY_AMT, A.REQ_AMT, A.REMAIN_AMT, A.CUST_ID, A.REMARK, A.SERVICE_YN, A.WON_MEMBER_ID, A.COMPLAIN_MEMO, A.CARER_MEMO, A.ENTER_ID, A.ENTER_DATE, A.EDIT_ID, A.EDIT_DATE, A.SMS_YN, A.STATUS, A.CARER_MEMOYN, A.CARER_DATE, A.DEPT_MEMOYN, A.DEPT_DATE, C.CUST_CODE, C.CUST_NAME, C.PHONE, C.HP, C.ADDR1, C.ADDR2, M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_CODE, P.INTRO_RATE, 'N' AS SAVETAG, A.SERVICE_COST, A.SERVICE_MIN_1, A.SERVICE_MIN_2, A.SERVICE_MIN_3, A.CONT_SEQ, A.AMT_1, A.AMT_2, A.AMT_3, A.FAMILY_YN, A.FAMILY_REF, A.DUPLISERVICE_YN, A.DUPLISERVICE_SEQ FROM SERVICE_SCHEDULE A LEFT JOIN CODE_MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID = A.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN CODE_CUST C ON C.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN CODE_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = A.PRODUCT_ID WHERE A.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND A.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND A.PLAN_DATE BETWEEN #{yymm}||'01' AND LAST_DAY(#{yymm}||'01')

SELECT MIN(CASE WHEN PRODUCT_CODE LIKE 'Z1%' THEN PRODUCT_CODE ELSE 'ZZZZZZZZZZ' END) AS PRODUCT_CODE_MOVE, MIN(CASE WHEN PRODUCT_CODE LIKE 'Z2%' THEN PRODUCT_CODE ELSE 'ZZZZZZZZZZ' END) AS PRODUCT_CODE_BATH, MAX(CASE WHEN PRODUCT_CODE LIKE 'Z3%' THEN SALE_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS AMT_MEAL FROM CODE_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_DIV = '7' AND PSEP_DIV = 'S' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_CODE LIKE 'Z%'
SELECT CUST_LEVEL_DIV FROM CODE_CUST WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId}
SELECT FN_GS_GET_SERVICEAMT(#{date}, #{stime}, #{smin}, #{etime}, #{emin}, #{serviceCost}, #{familyYn}, #{productId}, #{productDiv}, #{levelDiv}, #{serviceYn}) AS INFO FROM DUAL

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SALE_AMT, SERVICE_MIN FROM CODE_PRODUCT WHERE PSEP_DIV = 'S' AND #{date} BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE AND PRODUCT_DIV = #{productDiv} AND PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}

SELECT NO, FN_GS_GET_SERVICESCHEDULE('CUST', #{deptId}, YYYYMMDD, #{custId}) AS INFO FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(ROWNUM) NO, B.MM||B.DD YYYYMMDD FROM (SELECT #{yymm} MM, LPAD(ROWNUM,2,'0') DD FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM <=31 ) B WHERE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(B.MM||'01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') >= B.DD) X

SELECT M.SERVICE_DIV, M.STIME||':'||M.SMIN||' ~ '||M.ETIME||':'||M.EMIN AS SERVICE_TIME, CASE WHEN M.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE 'Z1%' OR M.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE 'Z2%' THEN '공단' -- 이동일때, 모두 공단 WHEN M.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE 'B%' THEN '혼합' ELSE '수급자' END AS SERVICE_TYPE, M.SERVICE_AMT, SUM(M.SERVICE_CNT) AS SERVICE_CNT, SUM(M.TOTAL_B_AMT) AS TOTAL_B_AMT, SUM(M.TOTAL_AMT) AS TOTAL_AMT, MAX(M.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SERVICE_SUMMARY M WHERE M.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND M.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND M.YYYYMM = #{yymm} GROUP BY M.SERVICE_DIV, M.STIME, M.SMIN, M.ETIME, M.EMIN, M.PRODUCT_CODE, M.SERVICE_AMT ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT M.SERVICE_DIV, M.SERVICE_AMT, M.REQ_AMT, M.PAY_AMT, M.B_AMT, M.PAY_B_AMT FROM SERVICE_SUMMARY_SUM M WHERE M.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND M.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND M.YYYYMM = #{yymm}
SELECT M.SERVICE_AMT, M.REQ_AMT, M.PAY_AMT, M.B_AMT, M.PAY_B_AMT FROM SERVICE_SUMMARY_SUM_TOT M WHERE M.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND M.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND M.YYYYMM = #{yymm}
SELECT FN_GS_GET_LIMIT_AMT(#{deptId}, #{custId}, #{yymm}), FN_GS_GET_M_LIMIT_AMT(#{deptId}, #{custId}, #{yymm}), FN_GS_GET_REMAIN_AMT(#{deptId}, #{custId}, #{yymm}) FROM DUAL
SELECT SATURDAY_YN, SUNDAY_YN, HOLIDAY_YN, HOLIDAY_NAME, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(WORK_DATE, 7, 2)) AS DAYNUM FROM SM_CODE_CALENDAR WHERE WORK_DATE LIKE #{year}||LPAD(#{month},2,'0')||'%'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DEPT_ID) FROM SERVICE_SCHEDULE A WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND A.PLAN_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{yymm}||'01') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{yymm}||'01'))

SELECT MAX(CONT_SEQ) FROM SERVICE_SCHEDULE WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND CUST_ID = #{custId} AND PLAN_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{month} ||'01','YYYYMMDD') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{month} ||'01','YYYYMMDD'))
